lexUnit.name: inhabitant.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person or animal that lives in or occupies a place.

sentence.text: Once more the inhabitants of the northern forests showed their impatience of these delays .
Unlike the Arab inhabitants of Palestine , Abdallah welcomed the prospect of economic development which the Zionist programme promised .
By 1910 the inhabitants of Britain consumed a million tons of meat over and above home produce .
